name: DBD Fire Fighter
author: Md Nurullah Hussain

sections.description:
DBD Fire Fighter developed by DBD IT

This is a free plugin to decorate your website with a expert DBD Fire Fighter

Plugin Features

  • A nice animated image will add on at the top left of your wordpress site.
  • No Overflow
  • Height:250px and Width: 200px
  • Still Effect
  • Image will load from plugin directory
  • Small Size Plugins & many More

Official Plugin Site: http://developer.documentbd.com/

Special Thanks

Zamiul Islam, Md Shojol, Rasel Ahmed, DBD IT Team
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Then activate this plugin

  • Now open your webstite and then check the new effect on your webstite top side area.
sections.faq:
Can i change this image ?

Yes, you can. Just replace the image file with same name and same directory.

Can i control that image size?

Yes you can, but you need to know the CSS for than and edit plugin dbd_fire_fighter.php file

How can i contact with plugin author to if i want?

Simply visit www.documentbd.com to meet with plugin author

short_description: After active this plugin a fire fighter will visible at the top left side of your website, very light weight plugin.
